column1: Doppo Kunikida is an idealist and a straitlaced detective at the Armed Detective Agency
column2: an organization that takes on dangerous jobs even the police won’t handle. Everything in his life is going just as he’s planned…until one day
column3: he’s paired up with the agency’s newest hire: a suspicious
column5: suicide-obsessed man named Osamu Dazai. Their first case together turns out to be far more complicated than Kunikida anticipated — and it looks like the detective agency’s sworn enemy

column1: Set two years before the events of the manga series
column2: this is the tale of how two seemingly incompatible personalities end up forming the partnership that has made them one of Yokohama’s top detective duos!
